name: Different Search Methods - Bloom Filter vs Vector Search
description: Completely different search approaches: probabilistic membership testing (bloom filter) vs semantic similarity search (vector embeddings)

snippets.description: Bloom filter operations for fast membership testing with probabilistic false positives
Vector similarity search using embeddings and cosine distance in Qdrant

notes: Completely different algorithms and use cases: Bloom filter is for fast 'does this exist?' checks (probabilistic), Vector search is for 'what is semantically similar?' queries (deterministic similarity scores). Different data structures, different purposes.
